abstract: Clorox is only the latest company that Carl C. Icahn has made an offer for. But whether it is bidding directly for a target or pushing it into a sale, he has a mixed deal-making record.
snippet: Clorox is only the latest company that Carl C. Icahn has made an offer for. But whether it is bidding directly for a target or pushing it into a sale, he has a mixed deal-making record.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn may have bid $10.2 billion for Clorox. But as his letter to the consumer products company makes clear, he is not necessarily interested in owning the detergents maker.

headline.main: Icahn, a Deal Maker With a Spotty Record

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
